snippet.title: BACKFIREWALL_ | Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2022
snippet.description:
We’ve finally announced Backfirewall_ at the PC Gaming Show today! It’s our new narrative game developed by Naraven Games and we’re super excited to invite you to its unique setting and present the stories of its colorful inhabitants to you.

The game will launch on PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch later this year.

Wishlist Now: https://bit.ly/Backfirewall_Steam

Don’t miss a demo version coming to Steam tomorrow!


Stay up to date on Backfirewall_: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/backfirewall 

Instagram: https://instagram.com/backfirewall

TikTok:  https://tiktok.com/@backfirewall

Discord: https://discord.gg/aKwkyWKNPa



Check out All in! Games:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allingamespub 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AllinGamesPub 

Join the Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/2dVUw2XyRY 


Join our newsletter and stay up to date: https://mailchi.mp/allingames/newsletter
